cite.text: Andres-San Roman, Jesus A., et al. 'CartoCell, a high-content pipeline for 3D image analysis, unveils cell morphology patterns in epithelia.' Cell Reports Methods 3.10 (2023).
Franco-Barranco, Daniel, et al. 'BiaPy: Accessible deep learning on bioimages.' bioRxiv (2024): 2024-02.

rdf_content.description: CartoCell is a deep learning-based image processing pipeline for the high-content segmentation of whole epithelial cysts acquired at low resolution with minimal human intervention. This pipeline enables high-precision cell segmentation that allows a single cell cartography study of major interest for the search of cellular patterns.
rdf_content.name: CartoCell
